name: Popeye the Sailor
info:
• 简体中文名: 大力水手
  • 别名: Popeye
  • 别名: 普派
  • 别名: 波派
  • 别名: 波佩
  • 别名: 波比
  • 别名: 波派
  • 别名: ポパイ
  • 性别: 男
  • 引用来源: Wikipedia
  • 官方网站: http://popeye.com/
detail:
Sailor. Tough-guy. Hero. Legend.
That's Popeye. An underdog with bulging forearms, a mean uppercut and a love of canned spinach. Unassuming, unsophisticated and undeterred by a challenge, from the minute he walked into the comic strip, THIMBLE THEATER, and muttered his famous “Ja think I’m a cowboy?” line, Popeye the Sailor Man captured the hearts of millions of fans around the globe. As the star of his own comics strips and animated series on the big screen and small, Popeye became quickly ingrained in American culture, and today remains one of the most recognizable pop-culture icons in the world.
